title: A Survey of Database Knob Tuning with Machine Learning
venue: 2023 IEEE 2nd International Conference on Electrical Engineering, Big Data and Algorithms (EEBDA)
abstract: As the scale of modern database management systems (DBMSs) becomes larger and larger, the configuration knobs have reached hundreds, which makes the traditional knob tuning methods canâ€™t meet the demand. It is urgent to use the latest technology to study more intelligent and perfect knob tuning technology to ensure the high-performance operation of DBMS. In this paper, we first analyze the limitations of the traditional knob tuning methods. After that, we discuss the research status and challenges of Bayesian Optimization (BO), Reinforcement Learning (RL) and Deep Learning (DL) applied to database knob tuning problems.
